source.name: Grim Hollow: Player's Guide
source.author: Jordon Gibson, Shawn Merwin
source.publisher: Ghostfire Gaming, Wizards of the Coast
source.description:
Do you dare set foot within the world of Etharis?
A god-less, unforgiving, war-torn world filled with Curses, Plagues & Ghoulish Creatures. A civilization that has long forgotten hope and now clings on desperately for survival.
This Dungeons and Dragons supplement is compatible with 5th Edition and designed to be friendly for both beginners and veterans alike!
The Players Guide is the perfect companion for players who wish to enhance their character and bring the feel of a gritty setting to their campaign. The Players Guide includes:
• 24 new subclasses • Races, backgrounds and a variant inspiration system, unique to Grim Hollow. • New schools of magic, including Sangromancy (blood magic) • A hoard of magic items, including magic items specific to transformation. E.g. Vampire, Fiend, Lich. • New Grim Hollow Player transformations for Fey, Elementals and Spectres
